=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Zepto files confidential DRHP with Sebi for upcoming IPO — Here's what you need to know
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 12:10
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Zepto has reportedly filed preliminary papers with the capital markets regulator Sebi to raise ₹11,000 crore through its initial public offering (IPO) via a confidential route. The company is likely targeting a listing in 2026. 

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://www.livemint.com/market/ipo/zepto-files-confidential-drhp-with-sebi-for-upcoming-ipo-heres-what-you-need-to-know-11766923309796.html
